item.title: OpenBazaar Ecosystem: Crypto Collectibles
item.description:
OpenBazaar Ecosystem: Crypto Collectibles

In these posts we take a look at some unique members of the OpenBazaar ecosystem. Today we interview a vendor selling comic books, Crypto Collectibles, who has one of the largest inventories on the network. You can find Crypto Collectibles on OpenBazaar at @crypto_collectibles/store, and on Duosearch here.

item.title: 25 Students Selected for the MIT Intro to Cryptocurrency Bootcamp for People of Color and Women - MIT Media Lab Digital Currency Initiative
item.description:
25 Students Selected for the MIT Intro to Cryptocurrency Bootcamp for People of Color and Women - MIT Media Lab Digital Currency Initiative

Today, the MIT Digital Currency Initiative is excited to announce the selection of 25 students to attend the first-ever Cryptocurrency Bootcamp at the MIT Media Lab. More than 300 students from 5 continents, 36 U.S. states and 150 universities applied for the opportunity to attend the bootcamp.

item.title: What is Steem and how does it work
item.description:
What is Steem and how does it work

Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 34:27 - 27.9MB) | EmbedSubscribe: iTunes | Android | RSSWhat is the Steem network and how does it work with Chris Coney.

item.title: 'Shadow Brokers' Claim To Have Hacked The NSA's Hackers
item.description:
'Shadow Brokers' Claim To Have Hacked The NSA's Hackers

The "Shadow Brokers" are in the spotlight. The mysterious group has seized the attention of the cybersecurity world with its claim to have stolen code from the Equation Group - a team of hackers who have been tied to the National Security Agency.

item.title: The Ugly Truth Behind Steemit
item.description:
The Ugly Truth Behind Steemit

You post content, people decide if they like it or not and depending on how 'popular' it is, you get paid. Being able to monetize your content is great and it's about time that we have a way to do it. However, when it comes to Steemit, appearance is deceiving.

item.title: Ethereum Price Weekly Analysis - Can ETH Buyers Gain Momentum? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Weekly Analysis - Can ETH Buyers Gain Momentum? - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price recently corrected higher versus the US Dollar, but we need to see if the current pace can be retained by buyers or not. Ethereum price recently corrected higher versus the US Dollar, but we need to see if the current pace can be retained by buyers or not.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Weekly Analysis -BTC/USD Poised For Gains - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Weekly Analysis -BTC/USD Poised For Gains - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price broke a major resistance zone versus the US Dollar, and currently looks poised for more gains in the near term. Bitcoin price broke a major resistance zone versus the US Dollar, and currently looks poised for more gains in the near term.

item.title: A Twisted Proposal by Rekcahxfb, Pops More Than One Question - NEWSBTC
item.description:
A Twisted Proposal by Rekcahxfb, Pops More Than One Question - NEWSBTC

The recent Bitcoin giveaway lottery posted by rekcahxfb is now said to be an elaborate marriage proposal. The bitcoins in questions are cleared of any association to the Bitfinex hack. Read more... Recently a post on Reddit took the platform by storm.

item.title: The Bitcoin Podcast: TBP81 - Redefining Trust
item.description:
The Bitcoin Podcast: TBP81 - Redefining Trust

Our guest today is Mariana Dahan is the Senior Operations Officer in the Office of the World Bank catalyzing progress towards identification systems using 21st century technology solutions. With Google Trends data showing that searches for the word "blockchain" have exponentially increased, we may be entering the peak of the hype cycle for blockchain and distributed ledger technology.

item.title: Retailers Dislike Cash and Cashless Payments, So What About Bitcoin?
item.description:
Retailers Dislike Cash and Cashless Payments, So What About Bitcoin?

For people who travel quite a bit every year using cash is pretty much a no-go. Dealing with currency conversions is a hassle, and it just feels awkward to deal with foreign currency. Moreover, a lot of travel accommodation services are no longer accepting cash payments.
